snippet.title: Arcade Game: Extra Bases (1980 Midway)
snippet.description:
A baseball game from Midway where it keeps continuing until you lose.

Ignore the glitch at 10:51. It was caused by the cheat file that I used. The best to play this game is by using a mouse since the trackball device is emulated using a mouse. 

Emulator: Mame Plus Plus Kaillera 0.148u5 with play to AVI option.
